summary: The reunion of the Monty Python team on stage for the first time in over thirty years, and for the last time ever.
cast: John Cleese|Terry Gilliam|Eric Idle|Terry Jones|Michael Palin|Graham Chapman|Carol Cleveland|Brian Cox|Samuel Holmes|Stephen Hawking|Eddie Izzard|John Du Prez|Mike Myers|Simon Beck|Jeff Leach|Mike Davis|Owain Harries|Nick Walsh|Steve Willingham|Allan Cocks|Corrina Silvester|Jamielisa Jacquemin|Sonia Jones|David Laudat|Melanie Marshall|Ashley Andrews|Gabby Antrobus|Curtis Angus|Caoife Coleman|Matthew Bradley|Majella Fitzgerald|Darron Gifty|Lavinia Fitzpatrick|Nick Gilligan|Lauren Hearnden Mayer|Jared Hageman|Holly James|Pip Hersee|Hayley Martin|Dominic Lamb|Carly Meyers|Kevin McGuire|Joanna Rennie|Matthew Wesley|Lisa Spencer|Ian Henderson|Dominic Kinnaird|Monty Python|Warwick Davis|Simon Jones|Dara O Briain
title: Monty Python Live (Mostly)
